capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Supervising field officers and contractors to implement works and maintenance programs effectively.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Planning works and operational activities, including pest and weed control and fire management.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Practical decision-making and problem-solving in field operations and emergency situations.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Maintaining relationships with field staff, contractors, and the broader Area team.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Leading a team in the field to maintain and construct park facilities and protect cultural sites.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Adhering to WH&S requirements and statutory obligations related to conservation.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Demonstrating enthusiasm, motivation, and fitness for physically demanding outdoor work.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Using various software programs and the Agencyâ€™s financial and asset management systems.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Implementing planned field and operational activities effectively.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Supervising and leading field teams in conservation and maintenance activities.

skills.name: Operational Planning
skills.description: Planning and executing field operations, including pest control and fire management.

skills.name: Safety Compliance
skills.description: Ensuring all activities comply with WH&S requirements.

skills.name: Technical Proficiency
skills.description: Operation and maintenance of machinery, plant, and equipment for maintenance and construction work.

generalRole.title: Senior Field Operations Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves leading field operations to maintain and enhance natural and cultural heritage within national parks, including supervising teams, planning and executing conservation projects, and ensuring safety and compliance.
